technologyLangList.dtl: <p><span style="font-size:16px;">T-Stack mold system is conducting special design and precision processing for mass production of home appliances, medical devices, and cosmetics packaging. T-Stack mold system is cost-saving, very efficient, and guaranteed quality. In addition, multiple hot runner technologies can be adapted to combine and control the two sets of injection systems in a comprehensive, integrated manner.</span></p>
